responses: Hello, this is LAMPbot. How may I help you?

patterns: What email address should I use to log-in?
What email address should I use to sign-in?
responses: The email address that you should use is your GC DOMAIN email with the format school_id_number@gordoncollege.edu.ph
You can click ‘Click Here’ beside the question ‘Forgot Password?’ under the LOGIN button then proceed with the process.’

patterns: Is it possible to update my profile?’
I want to know if I can update my profile?
Is it possible to change my profile?
I want to know if I can change my profile.
I want to change details in my profile.
How can I change my profile?’
responses: You can update your profile by clicking on your picture on the upper left side, it will then show a button “Update Profile” under your School Program. Click Update Profile to update your profile.

responses: You can click ‘Click Here’ beside the question ‘Forgot Password?’ under the LOGIN button then proceed with the process.

If you want to know if you have classes today, then look at the uppermost right, there you can see the Date, then go to Classes and click the button on the upper right that says ‘Class Schedule’ with a calendar icon to check your schedule.
You can view your schedule, just go to Classes and click the button on the upper right that says ‘Class Schedule’ with a calendar icon.
Gordon College is located in Olongapo City Sports Complex, Gordon College, Philippines

patterns: Can you give me information about Gordon College ?
Can you give me infos about Gordon College?
responses: Gordon College, formerly known as Olongapo City Colleges, is a public educational institution established in 1999. The school is supervised by the City Government of Olongapo. The said college started out as a training center that helps workers in developing skills necessary for employment at the former United States Naval Base. When the facility closed down, it was later converted into a degree-granting institution.

patterns: What programs does Gordon College offer ?
responses: Gordon College offers tertiary level programs. Degrees in the fields of Education, Nursing, Customs Administration, Accountancy, and Communication are open to students who are interested to pursue their education in the institution. Another offering is a senior high school program that features academic, arts and design, and technical-vocational-livelihood (TVL) strands
It is held on February 24 yearly.
See you later, thanks for visiting
Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure
